name: Stone Block Hide Puzzle
description:
Stone Block Hide Puzzle is a puzzle game where you arrange Stone s in a fixed square. You will have to use your IQ to match logical blocks to fill a row/column of big squares. Therefore, our block puzzle game is not just a game of fun, it is also an intellectual challenge.
* No time limit
* No colour match.
* Just fill the grids with matching blocks .
* Vertical or horizontal , both ok.
